00116 class NetPar : public ParSpike
00117 {
00118 private:
00120     inline static void sppk(unsigned char* c, int gid) {
00121         for (register int i = ParSpike::localgid_size_ - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
00122             c[i] = gid & 255;
00123             gid >>= 8;
00124         }
00125     }
00127     inline static int spupk(unsigned char* c) {
00128         int gid = c[0];
00129         for (register int i = 1; i < ParSpike::localgid_size_; ++i) {
00130             gid <<= 8;
00131             gid += c[i];
00132         }
00133         return gid;
00134     }
00135 public:
00136     NetPar(void);
